knee: Did you injure your knee recently?
Do you feel pain while walking?
Did you hear any popping sound when it started hurting?
Is it stiff in the morning?
chest: Is the pain sharp or dull?
Does it spread to your arm or back?
Did it start after exercise or stress?
back: Is your back pain constant or does it come and go?
Did you lift something heavy recently?
Does it hurt more when bending?
Does the pain spread to your legs?
Do you feel stiffness in the morning?
foot: Is there swelling in the foot?
Did you twist or injure your foot?
Do you feel pain while standing?
Is there any redness or warmth?
thigh: Did you experience a recent strain or pull?
Is the pain on the front or back of the thigh?
Do you feel pain while walking or climbing stairs?
Does resting help reduce the pain?
butt: Is the pain more on one side?
Do you feel numbness or tingling down the leg?
Did it start after exercise or injury?
stomach: Is the pain localized or spread across the abdomen?
pelvis: Is the pain sharp or dull?
Do you feel pressure in the lower abdomen?
Is the pain on one or both sides?
head: Is it a sharp or throbbing pain?
Do you feel dizzy?
Is it localized or all over?
Does light or sound make it worse?
Have you had headaches like this before?
neck: Do you feel stiffness in the neck?
Does turning your head increase the pain?
Did it start after sleeping in a bad position?
Do you have any numbness in arms?
Is there any swelling or tenderness?
shoulder: Did you lift anything heavy recently?
Do you feel pain while raising your arm?
Is the pain sharp or dull?
Is there any swelling or redness?
Do you feel weakness in the shoulder?
elbow: Is the pain on the inside or outside of the elbow?
Did you play sports or strain your arm recently?
Do you feel weakness when gripping things?
Is the area swollen or tender?
hand: Do you feel pain while holding objects?
Is there any tingling or numbness?
Did you injure or overuse your hand recently?
Can you move your fingers freely?
leg: Is the leg pain constant or comes and goes?
Do you feel cramps or tightness?
Did you overexert your leg recently?
Is there any visible bruising or swelling?
